summary: This is an automated out-of-office email reply from a US Attorney's Office (likely Southern District of New York) employee, indicating they will be out through February 21, 2020, and directing inquiries about Epstein probate matters to other colleagues.

persons.name: Unknown
persons.context: The sender of the out-of-office email, whose name is not provided in the excerpt. They are handling or reviewing matters related to the Epstein probate.

keyFacts: The email originates from the US Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USANYS).
The subject indicates ongoing work related to an 'Epstein probate update' as of February 2020.
The email shows the probate of Jeffrey Epstein's estate was an active matter requiring legal review within the US Attorney's Office several months after his death.
